ðŸ“– Summary: StarVector is a multimodal vision-language model designed for generating SVG code. It transforms vectorization into a code generation task, enabling both image-to-SVG and text-to-SVG generation. The model leverages a vision-language modeling architecture to process visual and textual inputs, producing high-quality SVG code.
